report.title: Tastes Like Burning
report.author: Hempeater
report.bodytext: Made tea from 5 grams of voacanga africana root. I let it steep for an hour. Smells like ginseng, tastes fiery, awful. /n /n 1:00 - Finished drinking the tea. /n /n 2:30 - Mild stimulant effect, similar to caffeine. Not much else as far as I can tell. /n /n 5:00 - Still feel the effect. It's not a bad caffeine substitute if not for the flavour.
